value:
So you're the Summoner, huh? The
Great Hero, the only one of your kind
across all realms...$k$pAwww! That makes you sound like a
chosen one! I'm so jealous!

I grew up in the great sea of stars, a
realm otherwise known as the
Deeprealms.$k$pI wasn't able to see my parents very
often, so I prayed to the stars that
they were safe.

I just came up with an amazing new
spell! I jotted it down in my spell
diary. Um... Huh... What page again?

Will you take me to that majestic gate
that transcends worlds?$k$pI mean the summoning ruins of
course. Just the thought of that place
makes my maiden heart flutter!

Oh, I was just polishing a holy stone.$k$pJust as prophetic words will not
reach a stagnant heart, the twinkle of
stars will not reside in a cloudy stone.

Just as the same light can reach
different kingdoms, prophecies can
reach different worlds.$k$pAnd this prophecy is a greeting
to you!
I hope you're watching, Father!

I can feel the light of the stars.
Only natural for a chosen one.

Aww, I was hoping to get stronger
in a jiffy!

Sparkling power wells up inside
me... Ophelia Dusk is reborn!

I am Ophelia, a warrior chosen by the
stars. I suppose I should say it's good
to meet you. Tell me...$k$pDoes my father Odin make this fair
land his home?

I was searching for you—the chosen
one born to bear the title of
Summoner.$k$pToday, I confer a sparkle unto you!
Ta-daaa! This is the sacred stone of
friendship!$k$pI found it soon after coming to this
world. It's the exact same color as
your eyes!$k$pI thought it would make a good gift,
so I polished it bit by bit—on days we
chatted or days we battled together.$k$pThose memories twinkle like the
stars, and now they're in this stone.$k$pIn other words, it's sparkly enough to
be worthy of being called a sacred
stone!$k$pThat's why now is the perfect time to
give it to you.$k$pI hope you'll give this stone a good
name. It sparkles because you've
made so many memories with me.$k$pAnd I also hope that we'll always get
along this well, for the rest of time.
はあっ！
えーい！
きゃあっ！
Nooo!
I'll show you what I've got!
Luminary Uppercut!
My passion burns bright!
Celestial blessings!
So many...stars...
Well met!
This land's beauty is as great as that of the stars sparkling in the sky.
My tome? It's a divine weapon given to me by my father. Its name is Missiletainn.
The Order of Heroes is the best! You're all... Pow! And Ka-blam!
Ah! I was just transmitting my thoughts to the stars. Did you need me for something?
I have an unusual mark on my arm. Would you like to see it?
I wonder when I'll truly become a chosen one. Like my father.
Ta-da! I found a beautiful gemstone, and it's begging for a name. Will you assist me in thinking of one?
Mm-hmm!
Ophelia Dusk!
By the stars!
